_description: Claude Code automated quality gate configuration - format, type check, build, test after every change. Git commits blocked until checks pass and user explicitly confirms.

hooks.command: cd "$(dirname "$0")/../../docker" && { docker info >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo '❌ Docker not running' >&2; exit 1; }; } && { docker compose ps mcts --format json 2>/dev/null | grep -q '"State":"running"' || docker compose up -d mcts; } && echo '✅ Container ready'

cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/docker" && { docker compose ps mcts --format json 2>/dev/null | grep -q '"State":"running"' || docker compose up -d mcts; } && docker compose exec -w /app mcts sh -c "$(echo "$TOOL_CALL" | jq -r '.parameters.command // empty')"
cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/docker" && docker compose exec -T mcts black . 2>/dev/null || true
cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/docker" && docker compose exec -T mcts python /app/.claude/hooks/test-hook-audit.py PostToolUse
cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/docker" && docker compose exec -T mcts python /app/.claude/hooks/quality-gate.py
